thread.title: Hammad Saleem & Louise Tompkins
thread.title_full: Energia reviewed by Hammad Saleem & Louise Tompkins

author: Hammad Saleem & Louise Tompkins
title: Hammad Saleem & Louise Tompkins
text: I love the way energia provides online chat facility of customer service for their customers. I had a few questons regards my units rates and bill queries, all of them were answered within 3 minutes! Other electric companies have online chat too but sometimes you have to wait in a queue over 15 minutes just for someone to help you!
